divs: sighting detailsi guess i was about 22 years old at the time. my friend and i were standing in a field\pasture behind my dad's old house and property in san leon. it was in the early evening and it was already dark outside. we were checking out a telescope, some binoculars and also shooting a bb gun. just screwing around. suddenly, in the near sky (maybe a 1\4 away, 45 deg angle up), something lit up the night and streaked off out of site\disappeared toward the south, towards galveston bay. it was silent and we could feel the brightness on our faces. there were no clouds in the sky that night. i remember waiting to hear a jet sound but nothing came. no sound. i did not see the shape of an object, only a flash and then a streak in the southerly direction, then nothing as it was gone. immediately\next thing we knew we were running away, scared. however, we calmed down about 50 yards later and then just walked back to the house. the area is somewhat rural with large pastures and an old electric plant nearby. lots of open space, dotted with a few streets and mobile homes, houses, cattle, horses, whatever people have out there. that's all i can remember. the entire sighting lasted 1 or 2 seconds. i did not have any missing time or anything like that. not abducted, etc. this was simply an unidentified flying object. it was not a jet, ball lightning, a prop plane, balloon, helicopter, etc. i have tried to be skeptical about what it could have been, but have never seen anything like that before. i have lived around airports and busy skies my entire life. it does not make sense. i don't really have anything else to lend on this sighting.
Summary: In the near sky as we stood in a pasture, sky lit up and an object took off to the south.
